attributes.action: Teach young kids from primary school age to how to manage plastic with ecobricks
attributes.background:
We need to get kids from a young age, know how to manage plastic waste. Ecobricks can be used to build herb or vegetable patches at schools.
If we get the children to encourage and to teach parents then we will save money from waste going to landfill and also keep plastic from our oceans

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because how a subject is taught is the responsibility of schools and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233541
